skip_reason: Perfect score (5/5) - this critique type skips perfect scores

source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenic video captures a long, straight road stretching through a vast, arid landscape toward a majestic range of snow-capped mountains. The peaks are illuminated by the warm, golden light of either sunrise or sunset under a clear sky. The camera provides a forward-moving perspective as if driving down the road.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenic video captures a long, straight road stretching through a vast, arid landscape toward a majestic range of snow-capped mountains. The peaks are illuminated by the warm, golden light of either sunrise or sunset under a clear sky. The camera provides a forward-moving perspective as if driving down the road.
